body: You're the one asserting no_chill is a man, against her claims; the burden of proof is on you. And angstkitten was one of the most popular users of all until a few months ago, way more than milkit. And she gained that status immediately after joining, with the admins even appointing her to every special position at the time, so clearly she had quite a lot to offer.
body_html: You're the one asserting no_chill is a man, against her claims; the burden of proof is on you. And angstkitten was one of the most popular users of all until a few months ago, way more than milkit. And she gained that status immediately after joining, with the admins even appointing her to every special position at the time, so clearly she had quite a lot to offer.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
Popular? lol

Why do I keep trying to argue with you? You're either too dumb, too ignorant or a combination of the two to argue legitimately. https://yourlogicalfallacyis.com/special-pleading

We were arguing about "top posters" and "most active", not about "popularity".

> You can't prove no_chill is just larping

Nor do I need to. Burden of proof falls on you. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burden_of_proof_(philosophy)

You're the one asserting that he is a woman. You've provided no evidence. What can be asserted without evidence can also be dismissed without evidence. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hitchens%27s_razor

Even if we were, which we aren't, arguing about who is "popular", milkit is still more popular than fucking AngstKitten lmfao. He's not popular _in the same circles_, but he is definitely more popular overall. Being popular in your communities is not the same as being popular.
parent.body_html:
Popular? lol

Why do I keep trying to argue with you? You're either too dumb, too ignorant or a combination of the two to argue legitimately. https://yourlogicalfallacyis.com/special-pleading

We were arguing about "top posters" and "most active", not about "popularity".

You can't prove no_chill is just larping

Nor do I need to. Burden of proof falls on you. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burden_of_proof_(philosophy)

You're the one asserting that he is a woman. You've provided no evidence. What can be asserted without evidence can also be dismissed without evidence. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hitchens%27s_razor

Even if we were, which we aren't, arguing about who is "popular", milkit is still more popular than fucking AngstKitten lmfao. He's not popular in the same circles, but he is definitely more popular overall. Being popular in your communities is not the same as being popular.

post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior. We are devolving in real time.

"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
> On average the female IQ is slightly higher

A flagrant lie. The female average IQ is 100 and the male average IQ is 103.

> males are more variable

This is true. Females are more densely concentrated in the "average" area, meaning there are less extremely dumb females and also less extremely smart females.

> I think that's better explained by females being smarter overall, but held to lower expectations, so they work less and are allowed to be lazy

"I think this is the explanation because it supports my sexist belief despite there being no evidence or logical arguments leading to this explanation"
HAHAHHHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA no.

> For every 10 male geniuses, there is 1 girl who is more brilliant than half of them combined.

Are you reading the shit you just wrote? You are literally contradicting yourself **twice** with a single sentence.

1) you're implying females are more variable, since you're saying there are 10 male geniuses and 1 female super-genius, when the evidence points to male IQ being more variable

2) you're saying that there's 1 smart female to 10 smart males, therein denying your previous premise, even though it was already false, that women are smarter on average. You literally implied a 10-1 ratio.
parent.body_html:
On average the female IQ is slightly higher

A flagrant lie. The female average IQ is 100 and the male average IQ is 103.

males are more variable

This is true. Females are more densely concentrated in the "average" area, meaning there are less extremely dumb females and also less extremely smart females.

I think that's better explained by females being smarter overall, but held to lower expectations, so they work less and are allowed to be lazy

"I think this is the explanation because it supports my sexist belief despite there being no evidence or logical arguments leading to this explanation" HAHAHHHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA no.

For every 10 male geniuses, there is 1 girl who is more brilliant than half of them combined.

Are you reading the shit you just wrote? You are literally contradicting yourself twice with a single sentence.

  1. you're implying females are more variable, since you're saying there are 10 male geniuses and 1 female super-genius, when the evidence points to male IQ being more variable

  2. you're saying that there's 1 smart female to 10 smart males, therein denying your previous premise, even though it was already false, that women are smarter on average. You literally implied a 10-1 ratio.

parent.body:
> implying we have to ban women from the workforce

No, you fucking moron, I was never implying that. You saw that because that's what you wanted to see, I never said it.

In fact, I've said across several comments that banning women from the workforce, beyond being morally unjustifiable, would be economically shooting yourself in the foot.

I was saying exactly what's fucking written there, you clown: that women wouldn't get out of the workforce given the opportunity. I neither said it's good nor that it's bad in that sentence.

I absolutely hate it when morons who can't read English put words in my mouth.

> the problem of them working

the... problem? One moment you're defending women being in the workforce, the next you're calling it a problem? What the fuck is wrong with you? Why can't you choose a position and stick to it?

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.

body:
Pagan religion is also the only one that accepts the existence of multiple gods in the first place. The vast majority of them are male and most of the female ones were just a husbands' sidekick outside of a few minority cults. Prostitution and sex slavery were normalized. In the Roman Empire, which had more womens' rights than the vast majority of societies up to that point, it was still illegal for them to even speak in public gatherings. Daughters were arranged marriages by their fathers, meaning the Romans thought the only purpose of woman was to bear children. Yet we have women as literal prophets and rulers in Israel 1000 years prior to that. Indeed, most of the "traditional values" you hear people speak of are solidly Greco-Roman beliefs, not Judeo-Christian ones.

You're right that satan wouldn't be male or female, because he's an angel, not an animal. The same would go with God. But in my experience satan is a lying little dipshit who promises all kinds of liberation and just ends up betraying you in the end. He's like a communist in that regard. He doesn't give a shit about what happens one way or another as long as he controls everyone and everything. He's sadistic. He'll promise you everything you ever wanted, but there's always a huge catch he's not telling you. He's the most massive fraud.

Pagan religion is also the only one that accepts the existence of multiple gods in the first place. The vast majority of them are male and most of the female ones were just a husbands' sidekick outside of a few minority cults. Prostitution and sex slavery were normalized. In the Roman Empire, which had more womens' rights than the vast majority of societies up to that point, it was still illegal for them to even speak in public gatherings. Daughters were arranged marriages by their fathers, meaning the Romans thought the only purpose of woman was to bear children. Yet we have women as literal prophets and rulers in Israel 1000 years prior to that. Indeed, most of the "traditional values" you hear people speak of are solidly Greco-Roman beliefs, not Judeo-Christian ones.

You're right that satan wouldn't be male or female, because he's an angel, not an animal. The same would go with God. But in my experience satan is a lying little dipshit who promises all kinds of liberation and just ends up betraying you in the end. He's like a communist in that regard. He doesn't give a shit about what happens one way or another as long as he controls everyone and everything. He's sadistic. He'll promise you everything you ever wanted, but there's always a huge catch he's not telling you. He's the most massive fraud.

parent.body: I can only partly agree on this. Pagan religion *always* had a strong focus and are the only one that have women as gods or deities. Morrigan, the goddess of death, the 3 Nourns as the keeper of time, Valkyries as female warrior spirits aiding men in combat etc. Also satanism is strongly centred around equally weighted genders. Satan has the form of both a male and a female. Making him also the first truly transgender god.

body:
Actually until recently it was the opposite, paganism has always emphasized the traditional gender roles, to the point where women are not allowed to do anything but have children. Nearly every ancient civilization and empire was based on this system. It was actually the abrahamic religions that originally promoted equality. The reason it changed was because the roman empire was threatened by the rapid rise of christianity, so they established a church system which inserted all kinds of greco-roman traditions and disguised them as doctrines, including the subordination of women to men. Most people fell for it, and I suppose the pagans reacted to this by reversing their original beliefs. Similar to how democrats and republicans frequently switch sides on certain issues because they're reactionary to what people on the other side are doing.

I'm not necessarily sure that men are *scared* per say, as they still have the upper hand in being able to oppress. I think it's out of jealously, knowing they'll never be as sophisticated or capable or happy as the other sex. I feel that way myself and I'm sure most guys do, but most of them hide it like they do all emotions because they're supposed to be "manly", macho, cocky, proud, and angry.

The reason it changed was because the roman empire was threatened by the rapid rise of christianity, so they established a church system which inserted all kinds of greco-roman traditions and disguised them as doctrines, including the subordination of women to men. Most people fell for it, and I suppose the pagans reacted to this by reversing their original beliefs. Similar to how democrats and republicans frequently switch sides on certain issues because they're reactionary to what people on the other side are doing.

I'm not necessarily sure that men are scared per say, as they still have the upper hand in being able to oppress. I think it's out of jealously, knowing they'll never be as sophisticated or capable or happy as the other sex. I feel that way myself and I'm sure most guys do, but most of them hide it like they do all emotions because they're supposed to be "manly", macho, cocky, proud, and angry.

body: Thus my point, women are better in almost everything, the only exception being spatial awareness and physical strength, and the fact that females always crush males on a heavily male-dominated site is evidence of that. There are biological reasons for this, as the job of being a warrior or a laborer generally takes up most of your time, while the female roles have more variety. So the men overspecialize in physical skills and the women are more well-rounded. A lot of this is hardwired since birth but gets way worse after puberty. Unfortunately the male skills are more or less obsolete nowadays.
